data.text: The control of an activity, process, or machine from a distance, as by radioed instructions or coded signals.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A device used to control an apparatus or machine from a distance.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A <xref>device</xref> used to <xref>operate</xref> an <xref>appliance</xref> (such as a <xref>television</xref>) or mechanical toy from a short distance away.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: a device that can be used to control a machine or apparatus from a distance
data.attributionText: from WordNet 3.0 Copyright 2006 by Princeton University. All rights reserved.
